text:
1. Page Title: Disgust and Despair

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Young man walking, deep in thought.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Young man: "Why do I feel so lost?"
       • Young man: "These rags... they don’t matter."

   
   - Panel 2 — Setup: Close-up of his refined, disgusted face.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Young man: "Such bitterness inside me..."
       • Young man: "I can’t escape it."

3. Layout: vertical strip

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The young man, despite his handsome appearance, is consumed by disgust and bitterness, feeling weak and ashamed in his ragged clothing as he navigates the streets of Petersburg.
